The Team

  • Anna - Team Leader, National Geographic Young Explorer, & Sister

    Behind every great group of men, is an even better woman! Anna is the brains behind this expedition, and the team-wrangler. As an archaeologist, she’s an expert at managing small teams in rural and outdoor environments, and coordinating logistics in remote places.

  • Charalampos – Local Guide, Cultural Expert, & Cousin

    The Sacagawea to our Lewis & Clark, Charalampos knows it all! Avid outdoorsman, local expert, and all around charmer, there’s nothing he can’t handle.

  • Vasili – Logistics Coordinator, Business Operations, & Brother-From-Another-Mother

    With a background in the outdoor adventure industry, Vasili has always been drawn toward the next adventure. Vasili is an accomplished sailor, fantastic dancer, and he once caught a fish with his bare hands.

  • Alexi – Cypriot Political Relations Expert, Modern-Day McGyver, & Brother

    Alexi is acting as the Mr. Miyagi to this group of merry explorers. A political dork with itchy feet, Alexi is offering the trailblazers his sage advice from the Cyprus of the west—California.

Circumnavigating Cyprus on Foot

  • Circumnavigating Cyprus on Foot
  • asanton@umich.edu
  • Anna Antoniou

4 people - 400 miles - 60 days
